subject: Football
Free Agents (Sports)
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Labor and Jobs
lead_paragraph: There will be no free agency, no player trades, no football activity of any kind other than preparations for the draft in late April, the last event built into the current labor deal.
snippet: There will be no free agency, no player trades, no football activity of any kind other than preparations for the draft in late April, the last event built into the current labor deal.
